message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to start the price at $15,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate you coming up, but I can't quite go that low yet.  Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $13,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $12,200?
Bob, you're getting close!  I can feel we're about to make a deal. How about we split the difference and call it $12,100?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit off. Would you be willing to go down to $11,900?
